sense.def:
A programme
je niz dejanj ali dogodkov, ki jih načrtujemo.

seg.quote: They have embarked on an ambitious energy programme.

sense.def:
A television or radio programme
je tisto, kar televizijska ali radijska postaja predvaja.

seg.quote: ...the last programme in our series on education.

sense.def:
A theatre or concert programme
je knjižica s podatki o igri ali glasbenih delih, ki jih bomo videli.

To programme a machine or system
pomeni nastaviti mehanizem stroja ali sistema tako, da bo deloval na določen način.

seg.quote: The radiators are programmed to come on at six every morning.
